It's crucial to exercise caution when using a Time-Turner as meddling with time can have severe consequences. The laws of time travel dictate that one cannot change events that have already occurred; rather, any actions taken in the past were already part of history.

So you see, while my experience with the Time-Turner was fascinating and immensely helpful academically speaking, it also taught me about responsibility and respecting the delicate nature of time itself.
